data.message: Facebook, there is a person who claimed to be a Facebook personnel who asked us for the Facebook information and PM him direct. Do you all have such protocol?

replies.message: Hi Janice. Facebook will never request your password over email or through Messenger, and we advise against providing your information to anyone under any circumstances. Please report this message by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2zT1eoj. -Kiara

Hi Kiara, is there a way I could verify if he is indeed an employee or ex-employee of Facebook? As I am desperately in need of solving my blocking issue, which I have reported for weeks and no response from your side.
